item.title: vRA 8 + NSX-T Blog Series Part 4: vRA 8 Blueprint with Existing Security Group (vRA tag)
item.author: Author
item.description: You can create a vRA 8 blueprint to deploy machines and place them in existing NSX-T security group(s) using vRA tags. Demo Product Versions vSphere 6.5 U3 vRA 8.0.1 (including vRSLCM and vIDM) NSX-T 2.5.1 vSAN 6.6.1 Prerequisites vRA 8: NSX-T account connected Basic infrastructure configured (Projects, Cloud Zones, Flavor Mappings, Image Mappings) NSX-T: security group(s) configured Process Overview Create a tag on the existing security group(s).
